resources.string: Notification displayed when a channel is closing, be it cooperative or not.
Alerts you when you need to start the app. Should be high priority.
This notification shows up when you receive a payment over Lightning.

The wallet is currently downloading an up-to-date map of the Lightning Network. Lightning payments might fail until synchronization is complete.

Note that this wallet computes payments routes on-device to protect your privacy.
Establishing connection with a default electrum server…

It seems that Eclair Mobile has not been able to run in background lately. Make sure that your phone does not aggressively optimize this application.

Some vendors like Nokia, Xiaomi, Huawei or Samsung run overzealous custom battery savers preventing non white-listed apps to run in background.

You can check our FAQ for more information.
No active channels yet…\nTo open a new channel click on the (+) button.
Tap anywhere to continue this short tour.
To display your address and\nreceive funds.
To open a Lightning Network channel.
Click here to send a payment
Make sure to have 1 channel\nin NORMAL state
An new version of Eclair Mobile has been released.\n\nPlease keep this app up to date to enjoy the latest features, bug fixes, and improvements!
Seed is not readable; eclair can not start.
Your device is not connected to the internet, or has a very slow connection. Please check your network settings.
Eclair could not start within a reasonable time frame. Please check your network settings.
Authentication has failed, please try again or use the PIN code dialog.
App did not initialize properly, restarting…
There was an error when starting the wallet. If this error persists, you can check the application\'s logs and contact our support.
Your seed is not encrypted. Please enter a PIN.

This phrase stores the information about your wallet. It is the only way to recover your funds if you lose your phone.

Please backup this phrase in a secure location (not on this phone).
What are the #%1$d, #%2$d and #%3$d words of the recovery phrase?
At least one word does not match.
The seed could not be saved on disk.\n\nCause: %1$s
Could not generate the recovery phrase…
The seed must now be encrypted with a 6 digits PIN.
Your wallet has been successfully created!
Eclair supports passphrase. If you don\'t know what this is, or if your wallet does not have a passphrase, leave this field blank, and click Next.
Type in the recovery phrase of your wallet. It should be a list of 12 or 24 words.
Use the keyboard below to type the seed:
Please enter the recovery phrase of your wallet using the virtual keyboard.
Seed has been restored and encrypted.
If you already used Eclair Mobile with this seed, you may have remaining active channels that could be restored.
Error when restoring this backup. Please try again.
Google Drive is not available on this device.

A backup was found but could not be read.

Origin: %1$s
Error: %2$s

Contact support at mobile@acinq.co
There was an error when looking for backup. Please try again.
Please grant access to your disk to check for local backups.
External storage is not available! Could not check for local backup.
We could not find any Lightning channels backups for this seed.\n\nYou can try again if needed, or proceed to use this seed without restoring lightning backups.
Note: this backup was created by another device. If the app is still running on that device, channels will conflict and automatically close.

Are you sure you want to proceed?

Any Lightning backups that would now exist for this seed will be overwritten, and you will not be able to restore them later.

Lightning funds on lingering backups will be lost.
Could not connect to the node: %1$s
Connection attempt has timeout… Please check the address and try again.
Please connect to the same node
Node discovery is based on a DNS seed mechanism (see BOLT 10).\n\nThis feature is not available yet.
Channel capacity must be between %1$s and %2$s
Not enough funds. Please lower the channel capacity.
This is not a valid node URI.\n\nExpected format is nodeId@host:port
Do you want this node to open a channel back? This will help you to receive payments over Lightning.
Once the channel you\'ve opened becomes active, a new channel with the corresponding inbound capacity will be opened with you, and will stay open at least 30 days.
Liquidity is not available now, try later…

Funds in your Lightning channels will not be included. You might want to close them first.
Uncapped routing fee ; check the application\'s settings.
Fees are very low, your transaction may need a very long time to confirm.
Fees seem very high, you may be overpaying.
The fees value is not valid.
You need Lightning channels for this feature.
You first need to open a Lightning channel to process this payment.\n\nDo this by swiping right to left from the home view, and tapping the green "+" button.
Your Lightning channels do not have enough balance to process this payment.
This payment has already been paid.
This payment cannot be sent. Try again later…

An advanced Lightning/Bitcoin mobile wallet by ACINQ. It relies on Electrum servers for access to the Bitcoin network.

Fees are retrieved from the BitGo API. Exchange rates are retrieved from the Blockchain.info api. Note that this conversion to fiat may not be accurate.

This software is compliant with the BOLT specifications (Lightning Network standard).

Any questions? Check the FAQ

You can also join our Gitter chat.

ACINQ is a Bitcoin technology company, and a proud member of the Lightning development community.

https://acinq.co

https://github.com/ACINQ/eclair-mobile

Lightning Network Stores
This independent service lists and ranks shops that accept Lightning payments.
Block height is not available yet…

Are you sure you want to delete your network database?

The application will restart automatically.
The seed is the wallet\'s private key. It gives access to your funds.\n\nBackup this seed in a secure location (not on this phone).
KEEP THIS SEED SAFE.\nDO NOT SHARE.

The app will restart and fully resync from Electrum. This can take a few minutes.

Are you sure you want to proceed?
PIN code must be a 6 digits number.
Prevent making a Lightning payment if the fee would be too high. Limit is set to 3% (with a tolerance if fee is smaller than 21 satoshis to allow tiny payments).
If this feature is enabled, you need to make sure that your phone doesn\'t stay without internet connectivity for more than two weeks straight.

Congratulations! You can now receive payment over Lightning.

Eclair Mobile will watch your channels in the background and will warn you if needed.

Note that you need to make sure that your phone doesn't stay without internet connectivity for more than two weeks straight.
Some of your existing channels have a "retaliation window" smaller than %1$d blocks, please close these channels first.\n\nAll Newly created channels will have a safe configuration.
Default description for your lightning payment requests.
Seed will be re-encrypted with a new PIN
Uses the PIN encrypting your wallet
Unlock your wallet with your fingerprint/iris/face
There was an error, please try again…
Your device does not support biometric authentication.
Biometric hardware is not available. Try again later.
You will have to use your PIN code from now
Scan a QR code containing a Bitcoin address or a Lightning payment request.
Scan the address of a Lightning Network node.
Are you sure you want to close this channel?

Warning!

Force-close is more expensive than a regular close and will incur a much longer delay before you get your funds back.

Only use force-close if your peer is not responding.
I want to force-close this channel.
Error when trying to close channel
Server must have a valid certificate.
Eclair Mobile needs write access to your device to make secure local backups.\n\nThis makes your wallet survive an app uninstall.
App needs access to the disk to create backups

The device\'s external storage is not available.

If you have an external SD card, make sure it\'s properly mounted. You can also check if you have enough memory.

Some features like local channels backup will not work properly.

How does it work?

Channels are encrypted and saved to your Google Drive account. When you restore the seed, you can also restore the last known state of your channels and retrieve funds that may have stayed in these channels.

What data are accessed by the app?

The wallet will only access its own data in Google Drive, and will not be able to read or write anything else.

What is saved?

Only lightning channels data are saved.

Can I opt out?

Yes, you can revoke access to Google Drive at anytime, which will disable this backup feature. The app will work as usual.

Can I have several backups from different seed on the same account?

Yes, a backup is linked to a seed with a hash, and several backups can coexist.

If you were to uninstall the app without closing your Lightning channels, you\'ll need a backup to be able to recover your channels and the funds on it. \n\nWe strongly recommend enabling a cloud-based backup option in case you lose your phone.
Please grant access to the device\'s local storage.
Are you sure you want to disable the Google Drive backup feature?\n\nA local backup only will not help if you lose your phone.
Google Drive is not available on this phone.
Choose an application to open with:
No logs will be written, which is best for performances.
Logs will be written in a rolling file on your phone.
Enter a PIN to \nencrypt the seed
You should see an incoming on-chain transaction.
You or your wallet unilaterally closed this channel. You will receive your funds in %1$d blocks. This value is dependent on the channel configuration.
Unable to watch your Lightning channels

To protect the funds in your Lightning channels, Eclair needs to watch the blockchain once in a while, but has been unable to do so the last few days. Make sure that you have a working internet connection.
Start Eclair Mobile for automated retaliation.
You must enable this feature in the settings first.
Please open a Lightning channel to receive payments over Lightning.
You may be unable to receive this payment:
- Your channels are currently not active.
- Requested amount exceeds your current inbound capacity.

This is the maximum amount you can receive in one payment.

This maximum amount depends on the inbound capacity of your channels.

To increase this amount, you must balance your channels so that your peers have enough funds on their side, or ask for nodes to open channels with you.
Requested amount exceeds your current inbound capacity (%1$s). Payment will probably fail.
